#summary Use API presented by workflow.

= Add an item for sale =

 * Choose the parameter values for the item to add.
  * Choose a category : you can retrieve the category list with [getCategoryList]()
  * Choose if it's a fixed price or an auction, discover the wanted params with
   * [getFieldsNamesForItemAuction]()
   * [getFieldsNamesForItemFixedPrice]()
 * Send your item
  * [addItemAuction]() if it's an auction
  * [addItemFixedPrice]() if it's a fixed price

Now, your item is in a queue. It will be added on Delcampe's website soon.
You will be informed by the Delcampe service when your item will be really processed and put on marketplace.
  * [Notifications#Seller_Item_Add Notifications Seller_Item_Add]

= My item is online but I want to make a change on it =
 * Call [updateItem]() to modify some fields. Be carefull : some fields cannot be changed when auction has his first bid.

= There is a bid on my auction =
When it happens, a notification "[Notifications#Seller_Item_FirstBid Seller_Item_FirstBid]" is sent to you by the Delcampe Service. It's important for you to catch it and process it on your side if you propose your item on sale on another place than Delcampe Website.
Indeed, as you have a bidder, you have a potential winner, and you cannot retract your item.

If you cannot manage this feedback you must leave the exclusive sale of that object to Delcampe.

= End of a fixed price sale =

It the most easy case, a member of Delcampe website has accept your price, the service send you a notification [Notifications#Seller_Item_Close_Sold Seller_Item_Close_Sold]

You can use the API to retrieve the list of all your sold items [getMySoldItemFixedPriceList]()

= Manage my notifications parameters =
 There is many notification type. You can retrieve the full list with [getAvailableNotifications]().

Theses notifications are sent by email and/or by curl.

If you decide to use api to manage your sales, the curl notification is the best way to handle feedbacks.

The most easy and  common usage is to set where the Service would send theses notifications. Do it with [setDefaultNotificationUrl]().
 
You can want to receive also notification by mail,  [setDefaultNotificationEmail]() let you choose an email different of the account email of the seller.
